item.title: 非同寻常的利益冲突沃伦要求美国证券交易委员会提供特朗普传媒投资产品的记录
item.description: 民主党参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）周五要求美国证券监管机构分享其对由总统唐纳德-特朗普创建并拥有多数股权的公司即将推出的交易所交易基金的监管计划。【原文：Democratic Senator Elizabeth Warren asked the U.S. Securities regulator on Friday to share its plans for regulating exchange-traded funds due to be launched by a company founded and majority-owned by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 受外汇影响，智利矿业公司 Codelco 税前利润大幅下滑
item.description: 智利矿业公司 Codelco 是世界上最大的铜生产商，该公司周五报告称，第一季度产量略有增长，但这一增长不足以抵消汇率的影响，汇率影响导致其利润下滑。【原文：Chilean miner Codelco, the world's largest copper producer, on Friday reported a slight bump in production in the first quarter, though the boost was not enough to offset exchange-rate effects, which caused its profits to tumble.】

item.title: Deliveroo 收到 DoorDash 提出的每股 180 便士的收购方案
item.description: 英国送餐公司 Deliveroo 周五证实，它于 4 月 5 日收到了来自 DoorDash 以每股 180 便士的价格收购其全部股份的提议。【原文：British meal delivery company Deliveroo confirmed on Friday that it received a proposal from DoorDash on April 5 to buy all of its shares for 180 pence each.】

item.title: 日元、日本央行利率政策可能仍是日美贸易谈判的焦点
item.description: 日本在周四的双边财政会谈中可能避免了美国要求日元走强的压力，但仔细研究一下官员们对会议的描述，就会发现货币和日本央行的利率政策可能仍然是更广泛贸易谈判中的关键因素。【原文：Japan may have averted U.S. pressure for a stronger yen in bilateral finance talks on Thursday, but a closer look at officials' descriptions of the meeting suggests currencies and the Bank of Japan's interest rate policy may remain key factors in broader trade negotiations.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会新任主席称加密货币行业应受到明确监管
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）新任负责人周五表示，该机构在过去几年中助长了 "监管的不确定性"，从而扼杀了加密货币行业的创新。【原文：The new head of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday said that the agency has stifled innovation for the cryptocurrency sector by fostering "regulatory uncertainty" in prior years.】

item.title: 安进公司将扩建俄亥俄州生物技术生产厂
item.description: 安进公司周五宣布斥资9亿美元扩建其在俄亥俄州的生物技术生产设施，成为在特朗普政府威胁可能征收进口关税之际承诺提高美国产能的一系列制药商中的最新一家。【原文：Amgen on Friday announced a $900 million expansion of its Ohio biotech manufacturing facility, becoming the latest in a string of drugmakers pledging to increase U.S. capacity amid Trump administration threats of potential import tariffs.】

item.title: 前 CISA 老大称特朗普的行动有可能 "危险地降低 "美国的网络防御能力
item.description: 美国网络安全和基础设施安全局（CISA）前局长周五在一篇文章中说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对高级网络官员的清洗和明显的报复行为使国家的数字防御面临风险。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's purges and apparent acts of retribution aimed at top cyber officials put the nation's digital defenses at risk, the former head of the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) said in a post on Friday.】

item.title: 股东批准家乐福将巴西业务私有化的申请
item.description: 据周五提交的一份证券文件显示，家乐福巴西分公司 Atacadao SA 的股东在法国零售商提出私有化要求后，投票决定将其私有化。【原文：Shareholders in Carrefour's Brazil unit, Atacadao SA , voted to take it private after a bid by the French retailer to do so, according to a securities filing on Friday.】

item.title: 爱尔兰多诺霍表示，欧盟将 "不遗余力 "地减少与贸易有关的不确定性
item.description: 爱尔兰财政部长帕夏尔-多诺霍（Paschal Donohoe）周五表示，欧盟将尽其所能与美国就贸易问题进行接触，减少拖累全球经济的巨大不确定性，这凸显了欧盟成员国之间的团结。【原文：The European Union will do all it can to engage with the U.S. on trade and reduce the massive uncertainty that is weighing down the global economy, Irish Finance Minister Paschal Donohoe said on Friday, underscoring unity among the bloc's members.】

item.title: 巴西淡水河谷公司认为贸易战迄今未造成实质性影响
item.description: 巴西矿商淡水河谷周五表示，迄今为止尚未看到正在进行的全球贸易战对其运营和销售产生实质性影响，但誓言在不确定的市场条件下继续密切关注。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale said on Friday that it has so far not seen a material impact from the ongoing global trade war on its operations and sales, but vowed to keep monitoring it closely amid uncertain market conditions.】

item.title: 受关税担忧影响，美国 4 月消费者信心依然疲软
item.description: 由于担心关税对经济的影响，4 月份美国消费者情绪连续第四个月下滑。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment ebbed for a fourth straight month in April amid concerns about the economic impact of tariffs.】

item.title: 中国放弃对部分美国商品征收关税，但否认特朗普关于谈判正在进行中的说法
item.description: 周五，中国免除了部分美国进口商品的高额关税，这表明两国之间的贸易战可能会有所缓和，但中国很快驳斥了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关于正在进行谈判的说法。【原文：China exempted some U.S. imports from its steep tariffs in a sign on Friday that the trade war between the two countries could be easing, though China quickly knocked down U.S. President Donald Trump's assertion that negotiations were underway.】

item.title: 散户投资者热捧比特币，Cantor Equity 股价大涨
item.description: 空头支票公司 Cantor Equity Partners 的股票周五大涨 29%，延续了上一交易日的炙热涨势，因为希望利用人们对比特币日益增长的兴趣的散户投资者蜂拥而至。【原文：Shares of blank-check firm Cantor Equity Partners surged 29% on Friday, extending a scorching rally from their previous session, as retail investors hoping to capitalize on the growing interest in bitcoin flocked to the stock.】

item.title: 墨西哥矿业集团因金属价格上涨而利润大增 17
item.description: 受金属价格上涨的推动，矿业和运输集团墨西哥集团（Grupo Mexico）周五报告称，2025 年第一季度净利润猛增 17%。【原文：Mining and transport conglomerate Grupo Mexico on Friday reported a 17% jump in its net profit during the first quarter of 2025, driven by higher metal prices.】

item.title: 独家报道报告称美国对制药业征收关税将使美国药品成本每年增加 510 亿美元
item.description: 路透社对一份由美国制药业贸易组织委托撰写的报告进行了审查，报告显示，如果美国对药品进口征收 25% 的关税，每年将使美国药品成本增加近 510 亿美元，如果转嫁出去，美国药品价格将上涨高达 12.9%。【原文：A 25% U.S. tariff on pharmaceutical imports would increase U.S. drug costs by nearly $51 billion annually, boosting U.S. prices by as much as 12.9% if passed on, a report commissioned by the industry's U.S. trade group and reviewed by Reuters shows.】

item.title: 汽车承运商寻求减免广泛的美国港口费用
item.description: 三位消息人士告诉路透社，美国贸易代表突然计划对所有外国建造的汽车运输船征收港口费，其中包括 20 艘在战争或国家紧急状态下为美国军队提供运输保障的船舶，大型汽车运输船的运营商正在寻求救济。【原文：Operators of hulking car carriers are seeking relief from the U.S. Trade Representative's surprise plan to levy port fees on all foreign-built ships in that segment, including 20 vessels that guarantee transport for the U.S. military during a war or national emergency, three sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 德国发展部长称世界银行不是美国银行
item.description: 德国经济合作与发展部长斯文嘉-舒尔茨告诉路透社记者，特朗普政府不能决定世界银行的使命，因为这个全球贷款机构的目标是基于许多国家达成的协议。【原文：The Trump administration cannot determine the mission of the World Bank because the global lender's goals are based on agreement by many countries, Svenja Schulze, Germany's minister for economic cooperation and development, told Reuters.】

item.title: 网络攻击后，英国 M&S 停止接受网上订单
item.description: 本周早些时候，玛莎百货公司报告了一起网络攻击事件，随后于周五停止了在英国和爱尔兰的在线订单，这一消息导致其股价下跌了 5%。【原文：Marks & Spencer stopped taking online orders in the UK and Ireland on Friday following a cyber attack which it reported earlier in the week, an announcement which sent its shares down by 5%.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）非洲部负责人：撒哈拉以南非洲地区必须提高收入以渡过全球动荡期
item.description: 国际货币基金组织非洲局局长阿贝贝-艾姆罗-塞拉西（Abebe Aemro Selassie）说，撒哈拉以南非洲经济体应努力增加国内税收，以避免在 "动荡的全球形势 "下不得不举债。【原文：Sub-Saharan African economies should work to increase their domestic revenue collection to avoid having to take on debt amid "turbulent global conditions", International Monetary Fund Africa Director Abebe Aemro Selassie said.】

item.title: 中美关税紧张局势缓解，全球股票基金第二周资金流入
item.description: 截至4月23日，全球股票基金连续第二周吸引资金流入，原因是有迹象表明中美之间的关税战可能降级，这刺激了对高风险资产的需求。【原文：Global equity funds attracted inflows for a second straight week through April 23, supported by signs of a potential de-escalation in the tariff war between the U.S. and China, which boosted demand for riskier assets.】

item.title: 美国债券基金六周来首次每周吸引资金流入
item.description: 截至4月23日当周，美国债券基金六周来首次录得资金净流入，原因是美国债券市场的抛售有所缓解，投资者对中美贸易战可能缓和抱有希望。【原文：U.S. bond funds recorded net inflows in the week through April 23 for the first time in six weeks, as a selloff in U.S. bond markets eased and investors grew hopeful about a potential de-escalation in the trade war between the U.S. and China.】

item.title: 美国法院将对 Citgo 母公司的股份展开为期 30 天的竞争
item.description: 据周四晚些时候提交的一份法院文件显示，负责监督委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司股份拍卖的一名美国法院官员提议于 4 月 28 日开始为期 30 天的竞标期，并于 6 月 11 日选出出售过程的最终获胜者。【原文：A U.S. court officer overseeing an auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum has proposed to open a 30-day competition period on April 28 to receive bids, with a final winner of the sale process to be selected on June 11, according to a court filing late on Thursday.】

item.title: 高露洁棕榄公司季度业绩超预期，上调全年销售预期
item.description: 高露洁-棕榄公司周五公布的季度业绩超过了华尔街的预期，并上调了全年销售预期，该公司希望通过适度提价和增加广告支出来刺激对其口腔和个人护理产品的需求。【原文：Colgate-Palmolive reported quarterly results that beat Wall Street estimates and raised its annual sales forecast on Friday, banking on moderate price hikes and higher advertising spending to boost demand for its oral and personal care products.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求放缓，印度塔塔科技公司收入不及预期
item.description: 受全球电动汽车需求放缓的影响，印度塔塔技术公司公布的第四季度收入低于预期。【原文：India's Tata Technologies reported a smaller-than-expected revenue for the fourth quarter, hurt by slowing global demand for electric vehicles.】

item.title: 加拿大 2 月零售销售下降 0.4%；3 月预计增长 0.7
item.description: 4月25日（路透社）--加拿大统计局周五称，由于汽车和零部件经销商的销售额下降，加拿大2月份零售销售额为693.3亿加元（499.5亿美元），比1月份下降0.4%。该机构在一份速报估计中说，3月份的销售额可能增长了0.7%。【原文：April 25 (Reuters) - Canadian retail sales fell by 0.4% in February from January at C$69.33 billion ($49.95 billion), on lower sales at motor vehicle and parts dealers, Statistics Canada said on Friday. Sales likely increased 0.7% in March, the agency said in a flash estimate.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行主席拒绝将比特币作为储备资产
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长周五表示，加密货币不符合该机构的货币储备标准，驳斥了加密货币倡导者要求瑞士国家银行持有比特币以对冲日益增长的全球经济风险的呼吁。【原文：The head of the Swiss National Bank said on Friday that cryptocurrencies failed to meet the institution's currency reserve standards, rebuffing calls by crypto advocates that it hold bitcoin as a hedge against growing global economic risks.】

item.title: 化工生产商利安德巴塞尔（LyondellBasell）因销量疲软，季度利润不及预期
item.description: 利安德巴塞尔公司（LyondellBasell）周五未能达到华尔街的季度利润预期，原因是为汽车、建筑和电子行业提供原材料的最大业务部门进行了维护活动，且产量下降。【原文：LyondellBasell on Friday missed Wall Street's quarterly profit expectations, due to maintenance activity and lower volumes in its largest segment supplying raw materials to the automotive, construction and electronics industries.】

item.title: 移动服务强劲，Charter Communications 营收超出预期
item.description: Charter Communications 周五公布的第一季度营收超出华尔街预期，其移动服务的新增用户数也超过预期，这主要得益于捆绑计划的强劲需求。【原文：Charter Communications on Friday topped Wall Street estimate for first-quarter revenue and added more subscribers than expected for its mobile services, thanks to strong demand for its bundled plans.】

item.title: HCA 医疗保健公司因医疗保健需求强劲而利润增加
item.description: 医院运营商 HCA Healthcare 周五表示，由于流感病例增加，更多的人接受了选择性手术和就医，其第一季度利润增长了近 9%。【原文：Hospital operator HCA Healthcare said on Friday its first-quarter profit rose nearly 9%, as more people underwent elective procedures and sought medical care due to a rise in flu cases.】

item.title: 艾伯维因新型免疫药物销售强劲而上调盈利预期
item.description: 艾伯维周五上调了 2025 年的利润预期，此前其较新的免疫学药物 Skyrizi 和 Rinvoq 的强劲销售帮助该公司第一季度盈利超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：AbbVie raised its 2025 profit forecast on Friday after strong sales of its newer immunology drugs Skyrizi and Rinvoq helped the company beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter earnings.】
